userStories.title: Analyze MetaGPT GitHub issues for improvement patterns

context.description: Examine issues from https://github.com/geekan/MetaGPT/issues to identify common problems, installation issues, and documentation gaps

userStories.title: Analyze OpenAI Swarm repository for architectural insights

context.description: Review https://github.com/openai/swarm to understand agent coordination patterns, ergonomic interfaces, and multi-agent system design

userStories.title: Analyze BMAD METHOD framework for workflow patterns

context.description: Examine https://github.com/bmad-code-org/BMAD-METHOD to identify reusable prompt patterns, structured workflows, and scale-adaptive capabilities

userStories.title: Compare framework issue patterns for common problems

context.description: Synthesize findings from all three frameworks to identify common problems: environment setup, API configuration, version compatibility, documentation gaps
Based on framework analysis, create specific recommendations for improving Blackbox5: better onboarding, clearer documentation, improved error handling

metadata.goal: Continuously analyze GitHub repositories of multi-agent frameworks (MetaGPT, Swarm, BMAD) to identify patterns, common issues, and improvement opportunities. Apply learnings to improve Blackbox5.
